messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Digest Number 4152
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/3/2003 7:46:56 AM Central Standard Time, ... Very well stated, and I totally 100% agree :)  We went to an observatory on Halloween.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/3/2003 7:46:56 AM Central Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

> If we are willing to go to
> other people's houses and expect them to give us candy, if in their own
> homes
> they want to attach a tract and give it out with the candy, who am I to
> judge?
> It's no different than tying a yellow ribbon around the old oak tree. We
> can't
> expect people to repect our values as unschoolers or republicans or
> democrats
> or independents or I don't care either which ways if we are not mutually
> respectful.
>

Very well stated, and I totally 100% agree :) We went to an observatory on
Halloween.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
